ai-tha-ap261:1.2_0: And staying at the root of a tree.
ai-tha-ap261:1.4_0: And he gave him a blow.
ai-tha-ap261:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap261:2.4_0: And there is a fruit of good and bad hut.
ai-tha-ap261:3.3_0: and when in all the world,
ai-tha-ap261:3.4_0: are said to be a wheel-turning monarch.
ai-tha-ap261:4.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap261:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable the senior venerable Kuṭa.
ai-tha-ap261:6.1_0: The ninth section with the senior monk who was junior.
